verses.t: Am I{G1510} not{G3756} an apostle{G652}? am I{G1510} not{G3756} free{G1658}? have I{G3708} not{G3780} seen{G3708} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} our{G2257} Lord{G3588}? are{G2075} not{G3756} ye{G5210} my{G3450} work{G3588} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}?

If{G1487} I be{G1510} not{G3756} an apostle{G652} unto others{G243}, yet{G235} doubtless{G1065} I am{G1510} to you{G5213}: for{G1063} the seal{G4973} of mine{G1699} apostleship{G651} are{G2075} ye{G5210} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}.
Mine{G1699} answer{G627} to them{G3588} that do examine{G350} me{G1691} is{G2076} this{G3778},
Have we{G2192} not{G3756} power{G1849} to eat{G5315} and{G2532} to drink{G4095}?

Have we{G2192} not{G3756} power{G1849} to lead about{G4013} a sister{G79}, a wife{G1135}, as well{G5613} as{G2532} other{G3062} apostles{G652}, and{G2532} as the brethren{G3588}of the Lord{G3588}, and{G2532} Cephas{G2786}?
Or{G2228} I{G1473} only{G3441} and{G2532} Barnabas{G921}, have{G2192} not{G3361} we power{G1849} to forbear working{G2038}?

Who{G5101} goeth a warfare{G4754} any time{G4218} at his own{G2398} charges{G3800}? who{G5101} planteth{G5452} a vineyard{G290}, and{G2532} eateth{G2068} not{G3756} of{G1537} the fruit{G3588} thereof{G846}? or{G2228} who{G5101} feedeth{G4165} a flock{G4167}, and{G2532} eateth{G2068} not{G3756} of{G1537} the milk{G3588} of the flock{G3588}?
Say I{G2980} these things{G5023} as{G2596} a man{G444}? or{G2228} saith{G3004} not{G3780} the law{G3588} the same{G5023} also{G2532}?

For{G1063} it is written{G1125} in{G1722} the law{G3551} of Moses{G3475}, Thou shalt{G5392} not{G3756} muzzle the mouth of{G5392} the ox{G1016} that treadeth out the corn{G248}. Doth{G3199} God{G3588} take care{G3199} for oxen{G3588}?

Or{G2228} saith he{G3004} it altogether{G3843} for{G1223} our sakes{G2248}? For{G1223} our sakes{G2248}, no doubt{G1063}, this is written{G1125}: that{G3754} he{G3588} that ploweth{G722} should{G3784} plow{G722} in{G1909} hope{G1680}; and that{G2532} he that{G3588} thresheth{G248} in{G1909} hope{G3588} should be partaker{G3348} of his{G846} hope{G1680}.
If{G1487} we{G2249} have sown{G4687} unto you{G5213} spiritual things{G4152}, is it a great thing{G3173} if{G1487} we{G2249} shall reap{G2325} your{G5216} carnal things{G4559}?

If{G1487} others{G243} be partakers{G3348} of this power{G3588} over you{G5216}, are not{G3756} we{G2249} rather{G3123}? Nevertheless{G235} we have{G5530} not{G3756} used{G5530} this{G3778} power{G3588}; but{G235} suffer{G4722} all things{G3956}, lest{G2443} we should{G1325} hinder{G1464} the gospel{G3588} of Christ{G3588}.

Do ye{G1492} not{G3756} know{G1492} that{G3754} they{G3588} which minister{G2038} about holy things{G2413} live{G2068} of the things of{G1537} the temple{G3588}? and they which wait{G4332} at the altar{G3588} are partakers{G4829} with the altar{G3588}?
Even{G2532} so{G3779} hath{G1299} the Lord{G3588} ordained that{G1299} they which{G3588} preach{G2605} the gospel{G3588} should live{G2198} of{G1537} the gospel{G3588}.

But{G1161} I{G1473} have used{G5530} none{G3762} of these things{G5130}: neither{G3756} have I written{G1125} these things{G5023}, that{G2443} it should be{G1096} so{G3779} done{G1096} unto{G1722} me{G1698}: for{G1063} it were better{G2570} for me{G3427} to die{G599}, than{G2228} that{G2443} any man{G5100} should make{G2758} my{G3450} glorying{G3588} void{G2758}.

For{G1063} though{G1437} I preach the gospel{G2097}, I{G3427} have{G2076} nothing{G3756} to glory of{G2745}: for{G1063} necessity{G318} is laid{G1945} upon me{G3427}; yea{G1161}, woe{G3759} is{G2076} unto me{G3427}, if{G1437} I preach{G2097} not{G3361} the gospel{G2097}!

For{G1063} if{G1487} I do{G4238} this thing{G5124} willingly{G1635}, I have{G2192}a reward{G3408}: but{G1161} if{G1487} against my will{G210}, a dispensation{G3622} of the gospel is committed unto me{G4100}.

What{G5101} is{G2076} my{G3427} reward{G3588} then{G3767}? Verily that{G2443}, when I preach the gospel{G2097}, I may make{G5087} the gospel{G3588} of Christ{G3588} without charge{G77}, that I abuse{G2710} not{G3361} my{G3450} power{G3588} in{G1722} the gospel{G3588}.UNSURE: TAgging of "eis"
For{G1063} though I be{G5607} free{G1658} from{G1537} all{G3956} men, yet have I made{G1402} myself{G1683} servant{G1402} unto all{G3956}, that{G2443} I might gain{G2770} the more{G4119}.

And{G2532} unto the Jews{G2453} I became{G1096} as{G5613} a Jew{G2453}, that{G2443} I might gain{G2770} the Jews{G2453}; to them that are{G3588} under{G5259} the law{G3551}, as{G5613} under{G5259} the law{G3551}, that{G2443} I might gain{G2770} them that are{G3588} under{G5259} the law{G3551};

To them that are without law{G459}, as{G5613} without law{G459}, (being{G5607} not{G3361} without law{G459} to God{G2316}, but{G235} under the law{G1772} to Christ{G5547},) that{G2443} I might gain{G2770} them that are without law{G459}.Normally, Where a definate article is used as a relative pronoun; I include when with a participle. However here since the last phrase "anomous" is one long description as is in the very begining of this verse; for the sake of consistency in the verse I did not use it.

To the weak{G772} became I{G1096} as{G5613} weak{G772}, that{G2443} I might gain{G2770} the weak{G772}: I am made{G1096} all things{G3956} to all{G3956} men, that{G2443} I might{G4982} by all means{G3843} save{G4982} some{G5100}.
And{G1161} this{G5124} I do{G4160} for{G1223} the gospel's sake{G3588}, that{G2443} I might be{G1096} partaker{G4791} thereof with{G846} you.

Know ye{G1492} not{G3756} that{G3754} they which{G3588} run{G5143} in{G1722} a race{G4712} run{G5143} all{G3956}, but{G1161} one{G1520} receiveth{G2983} the prize{G3588}? So{G3779} run{G5143}, that{G2443} ye may obtain{G2638}.

And{G1161} every man{G3956} that striveth for the mastery{G75} is temperate{G1467} in all things{G3956}. Now{G3767} they{G1565} do it to{G2443} obtain{G2983} a corruptible{G5349} crown{G4735}; but{G1161} we{G2249} an incorruptible{G862}.
I{G1473} therefore{G5106} so{G3779} run{G5143}, not{G3756} as{G5613} uncertainly{G84}; so{G3779} fight I{G4438}, not{G3756} as{G5613} one that beateth{G1194} the air{G109}:

But{G235} I keep under{G5299} my{G3450} body{G3588}, and{G2532} bring{G1396} it into subjection{G1396}: lest that by any means{G3381}, when I have preached{G2784} to others{G243}, I myself{G846} should be{G1096} a castaway{G96}.
